comments.body:
:+1:

Our Akka boilerplate is pretty slow. I am all for using `TestKit` where possible.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +24,28 @@
class StateUpdateExporterSpec
    extends TestKit(ActorSystem(classOf[StateUpdateExporterSpec].getSimpleName))
    with AsyncWordSpecLike
    with Matchers

comments.body: Likewise, Scala 2.13.6 detected that this was overriding an `executionContext` in `AsyncTestSuite`.
